name: patronizingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows that you think someone is stupid or not important: She smiled at him patronisingly. He'd told her patronizingly to go home and stop interfering in his case.
More examplesFewer examples"What a perceptive question," she commented, patronisingly.He smiled and and patted her hand patronizingly once more.He was rather patronizingly called an armchair psychologist.Most of them are working people, whether or not they live on what he patronizingly calls "sink estates".
